dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down problems into manageable parts, analyzing data and logical patterns to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and creative thinking, often finding innovative solutions that others might overlook.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty and risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach new opportunities with a healthy dose of skepticism, weighing the pros and cons carefully before acting.
Your FarTwin will be open to taking calculated risks, seeking out new experiences and challenges that push them outside their comfort zone.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Process
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use data and objective criteria to inform their decisions, weighing the evidence and seeking out consensus.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and rely on their emotional intelligence to guide their decision-making process.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer to work independently, taking ownership of their projects and decisions.
Your FarTwin will be a team player, seeking out opportunities to collaborate with others and learn from their perspectives.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach global issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on local concerns and may struggle to see the broader implications of their actions.
Your FarTwin will take a holistic view, considering the global impact of their decisions and seeking out diverse perspectives.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin acquire new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer traditional learning methods, such as reading and lectures, to absorb new information.
Your FarTwin will learn best through hands-on experiences, experimenting with new ideas and techniques.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach conflicts head-on, challenging the other party to a direct debate.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground and try to find mutually beneficial solutions that satisfy both parties.
